Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Why do they keep repairing you? You are annoying…

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: It is all due to the fulfillment of my services.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You have to be kidding me… I will find whoever is reprogramming you and I will chase him to death.

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: I can not let you do that. My program indicates that you must die instantly.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Can we just avoid this talk and go straight to the point? They are waiting for me.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Can I ask you something? Why would anybody like to be with such a piece of junk, cables and gears like you?

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: I am not allowed to do that.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Nice! Now this freakin robot is making fun of me!

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Can you please tell your creators to create better units. I am getting bored with you buddy.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You know? We could have worked together. I have to admit that you are not bad...

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: What does push you away from that decision?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Mmmmmm, I just hate your specie, nothing else.
